message: Hello Bob, I have a fantastic product that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to offer it to you for $200.
I'm interested in the product, but $200 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $150 for it.
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I can do $180, but that's as low as I'm willing to go.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $180 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $160 for it.
I'm willing to meet you halfway, Bob. I can do $170, but I'm not going any lower than that.
I'm still a bit hesitant, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll pay $165 for the product.
I'm not going to budge much more, Bob. I can do $175, but that's my final offer.
I'm still not comfortable with $175. I'll pay $170 for the product, but that's my final offer.
I've already told you my final offer, Bob. I'm not going to counteroffer again. I'll sell it to you for $175 or not at all.
